d*. \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, O my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.  +  r 146.1  t Praise yeâ€¦: Heb. Hallelujah *

While I \w live|strong="H2416"\w* will I \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: I will sing \w praises|strong="H2167"\w* unto my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* while I have any being.

Put not your \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in \w princes|strong="H5081"\w*, \add nor\add* in the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, in whom \add there is\add* no \w help|strong="H8668"\w*.\f + \fr 146.3 \ft help: or, salvation\f*

His \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* goeth \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, he \w returneth|strong="H7725"\w* to his \w earth|strong="H0127"\w*; in that very \w day|strong="H3117"\w* his \w thoughts|strong="H6250"\w* \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.

\w Happy|strong="H0835"\w* \add is he\add* that \add hath\add* the \w God|strong="H0410"\w* of \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* for his \w help|strong="H5828"\w*, whose \w hope|strong="H7664"\w* \add is\add* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his \w God|strong="H0430"\w*:

Which \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and all that therein \add is:\add* which \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* \w truth|strong="H0571"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*:

Which \w executeth|strong="H6213"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* for the \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w*: which \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w* to the \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*. The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w looseth|strong="H5425"\w* the \w prisoners|strong="H0631"\w*:

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w openeth|strong="H6491"\w* \add the eyes of\add* the \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*: the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w raiseth|strong="H2210"\w* them that are bowed \w down|strong="H3721"\w*: the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w loveth|strong="H0157"\w* the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*:

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w preserveth|strong="H8104"\w* the \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w*; he \w relieveth|strong="H5749"\w* the \w fatherless|strong="H3490"\w* and \w widow|strong="H0490"\w*: but the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* he turneth upside \w down|strong="H5791"\w*.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, \add even\add* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, O \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, unto \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*. \w Praise|strong="H1984"\w* ye the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3050"\+w*
d*.
